member.postal_address: Office 801, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Olga Chaidou is currently completing her studies at the Athens University of Economics and Business, Department of Management Science and Technology with a specialization in Information Systems and E-Business. She speaks English and German fluently. Since January 2004, she has been working as a Research Assistant at ELTRUN, The eBusiness Center, involved in the EU Project Guide (IST-2003-507495). Her research interests lay in the field of E-Government and Health Information Systems as well as in Methodological Research approaches in Information Infrastructures.
